General.Name: Scandion Oncology A/S
General.Description: Scandion Oncology A/S, a clinical-stage biotechnology company, develops medicines for the treatment of chemotherapy resistance. Its lead product candidate includes the SCO-101, an oral drug that is in clinical Phase Ib and Phase II studies in cancer patients. The company's other product candidate is SCO-201, which is in preclinical trial for the treatment of solid tumors. Scandion Oncology A/S was incorporated in 2017 and is headquartered in Copenhagen, Denmark.

4.Name: Ms. Annie  Rasmussen
4.Title: Chief Clinical Officer & Employee Representative Director
